required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Blood Collection Sub-Study of Exact Sciences Protocol 2019-01: "Clinical Validation of an Optimized Multi-Target Stool DNA (Mt-sDNA 2.0) Test, For Colorectal Cancer Screening BLUE-C"
clinical_study.official_title: Blood Collection Sub-Study of Exact Sciences Protocol 2019-01: "Clinical Validation of an Optimized Multi-Target Stool DNA (Mt-sDNA 2.0) Test, For Colorectal Cancer Screening BLUE-C"

brief_summary.textblock: The primary objective of this sub-study, 2019-01B, is to collect blood specimens for research use in the development and validation of a blood-based test for colorectal cancer (CRC).

detailed_description.textblock: Subjects who consent to enroll in Exact Sciences Protocol 2019-01 BLUE-C, will be invited to participate in this sub-study. Subjects enrolled in the Exact Sciences Protocol 2019-01 BLUE-C, who provide written informed consent to participate in this sub-study, will have a blood sample collected at enrollment.

primary_outcome.measure: Blood-based biomarkers associated with genetic and epigenetic alterations.
primary_outcome.time_frame: Point in time blood collection (1 day) at enrollment

arm_group.description: Subjects will be men and women, 40 years of age or older, who enroll in Exact Sciences Protocol 2019-01 BLUE-C. Subjects will provide a blood sample at time of enrollment.

intervention.description: Subjects participating in the study will have blood drawn at enrollment.

biospec_descr.textblock: Blood samples may be used for evaluating performance of biomarkers for feasibility and assay development. Sample may be stored for up to 20 years. These blood samples will be de-identified.

study_pop.textblock: Subjects will be men and women, 40 years of age or older, who enroll in Exact Sciences Protocol 2019-01 BLUE-C. Up to 24,000 subjects will be enrolled.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Subject is currently enrolled in Exact Sciences Protocol 2019-01 BLUE-C.
2. Subject is willing and able to provide a blood sample.
3. Subject is willing and able to sign informed consent.
Exclusion Criteria:
1. Subject has any condition that in the opinion of the Investigator should preclude participation in the study.

patient_data.ipd_description: Individual participant data that underlie the results reported in publications of the study may be shared after de-identification. This may include text, tables, figures, and appendices. The study protocol and informed consent form may also be shared. Data may be shared with researchers who provide a methodologically sound proposal to achieve the aims outlined in the approved proposal.
patient_data.ipd_time_frame: Data may be available from 2 years and ending 4 years after publication.
patient_data.ipd_access_criteria: Proposals for access to data should be directed to clinicaltrials@exactsciences.com. To gain access, data requestors will need to provide a methodologically sound proposal and sign a data access agreement. Researchers are required to obtain necessary IRB/EC approvals or waivers as applicable to conduct research.
